text:
With the massive success of Kendall and Kylie Jenner’s limited-edition DropOne this year, it’s not surprising that the “Keeping” sisters are back with a second capsule collection.

After teasing the range on social media, DropTwo finally dropped yesterday at 12 p.m.

If you’re going to shop the collection, you’re going to want to get on it fast, as there are only 100 creations of each item.

According to E! News, the reality star’s range covers everything from basic bodysuits and graphic tees to athleisure wear, as well as jeans with grommet cutouts, embroidered skirts, phone cases and the ultimate range of bodycon dresses.

As far as shoes, DropTwo features an over-the-knee stiletto boot, suede sneakers named after their nephew, Kourtney’s son, Reign, metallic chain-embellished slides, suede heeled sandals and a simple black ankle boot.

Kendall Jenner wearing the “Reign” suede sneaker. CREDIT: Courtesy of brand

“Reign” suede sneaker. CREDIT: Courtesy of brand

“Reign” Suede Sneaker, $135; kendall-kylie.com

To shop more shoes from the DropTwo, check out the gallery here.

Want more?

title: Kendall and Kylie Jenner’s Second Limited-Edition Line, DropTwo, Includes Shoes for Every Occasion
